item.description: Raven and Stephanie Grimassi will be at Gayle's Thyme on Sept 30, 2011 promoting his new book “Old World Witchcraft: Ancient Ways for Modern Days” . There will be a meet and Greet with book signing starting at 6:00pm. At 7:00 PM will be a work shop about the soul of the Old World Witch, a mentality of primal magic and awareness. Fee for the workshop only is $20.00. Pre registration is required for the workshop
item.name: Meet and Greet with Raven Grimassi
